data.title: R.I.P. Jerry Goldsmith
data.meta_description: Just got this in my mailbox.  Award-winning film and TV composer Jerry Goldsmith died July 21 of cancer in  Beverly Hills, Calif. He was 75.  Memorial service Friday July 23, 2004 at 2:00 pm at Hillside Memorial Park in Los Angeles. The memorial service is open to the  public.
